creditBlockNotExists: The specified credit block does not exist.
creditBlockDoesNotOwnBySender: The sender does not own the credit block.
notEnoughCreditAmount: Not enough credit amount available for the transfer.
noTransferPermission: You do not have permission to transfer credits.
noRetirePermission: You do not have permission to retire credits.
noRetireActionPermission: You do not have permission to approve or reject credit retirement requests.
